attributes.action: Stop Playing The Role of 'International Government' and Focus On The UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems the government spends so much of its time and budget trying to fix international problems and help out other countries, when there is so much we need to sort out right here in the UK. The British government should not be allowed to spend so much time and money on international affairs such as the "War on Terror". How about a war on Illeagal Immigration; a War on Poor NHS Funding; a War on Over Taxing, a War on the Dictatorship that we here in the UK are living under. There are so many of your 'Wars' right under your nose. Take your head out of your a and have a look Mr B.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
